pages.text: $(li)The Lumbering enchantment Axe and Pickarang.$(br)$(li)This enchantment allows to you cut down whole trees. You must to be sneaking while you are cutting the tree to apply this effect.
pages.title: Lumbering

pages.text: $(li)It can be created combining a Golden Axe with a Book and Quill in an Anvil.
